column1: #text=This afternoon I went to the library .
#text=I needed a really good book to read about dinosaurs .
#text=I walked up to the reception desk and asked the librarian where the dinosaur books could be found .
#text=She took me to the right area and I looked at all of the choices .
#text=I chose a few that I thought looked really interesting .
#text=I took the books I had chosen and walked over to the self checkout area .
#text=I pulled out my library card and scanned it with the scanning wand .
#text=I then used the wand to scan the bar code on each of the books .
#text=When they had all been scanned I checked the screen to make sure everything was correct .
#text=I clicked on the button to print my receipt .
#text=I put the receipt inside one of the books , picked up the books and went out the door .
#text=I could hardly wait to get home and start reading .
